name: 2014-round-household-projections
title: 2014 round household projections
description:
Household projections incorporating the results of the GLA's 2014 round of population projections. Household formation assumptions are based on those from the Department of Communities and Local Government's (DCLG) 2012-based household projections.

*Updated 25/04/2015 Minor correction to birth and death inputs

resources.name: HH_trend_short_term_2014rnd.xlsx
resources.description: Incorporate the GLA's short-term migration trend-based population projections.

resources.name: HH_trend_long_term_2014rnd.xlsx
resources.description: Incorporate the GLA's long-term migration trend-based population projections.

resources.name: HH_SHLAA_DCLG_long_term_2014rnd.xlsx
resources.description: Incorporate development assumptions based on the 2013 SHLAA and long term migration assumptions
